Redd Survey Data

redd.Rd

Raw redd survey monitoring data. Redd survey data is available for Battle Creek, Clear Creek, Feather River, Mill Creek, Yuba River.

redd

Format

  • date: year data were collected

  • latitude: latitude of redd location

  • longitude: longitude of redd location

  • reach: survey reach where data were collected

  • river_mile: river mile of redd location

  • redd_id: unique identifier of redd

  • fish_guarding: whether or not fish were observed guarding the redd

  • redd_measured: whether or not the redd was measured

  • redd_width: widdth of redd (m)

  • redd_length: length of redd (m)

  • velocity: measured stream velocity (ft/s)

  • age: age of redd

  • age_index: number of times a unique redd was aged If 0, the redd was surveyed but not aged.

  • redd_count: number of redds surveyed

  • stream: stream data were collected on

  • year: year data were collected

  • survey_method: surveying method

  • run: run of fish associated with redd

  • species: species of fish associated with redd

  • depth_m: depth of water (m)

  • starting_elevation_ft: starting elevation (ft)

  • num_of_fish_on_redd: number of fish observed on redd

  • redd_substrate_class: size class of substrate determined by millimeter size

  • tail_substrate_class: size class of tail substrate determined by millimeter size

  • pre_redd_substrate_class: size class of substrate pre-redd determined by millimeter size

Source

Redd data were provided by monitoring programs. These data are currently being uploaded to EDI. In the meantime you can find data exploration scripts for each tributary here and combined redd data here.
